title: Artificial intelligence, bitcoin as top BlackRock ETF place

content:

title: Artificial intelligence emerging as powerful patient safety tool in pediatric anesthesia
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) could soon help anesthesiologists keep children safer in the operating room and improve their recovery with better pain management, suggests a systematic review presented at the ANESTHESIOLOGY 2025 annual meeting.

title: Govt forms AI advisory panel to boost digital transformation in Pakistan
description: Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif said that artificial intelligence will help Pakistan reach new levels of progress.
content:
The government has decided to establish an expert-led Artificial Intelligence (AI) advisory panel to supervise and support the execution of AI projects in Pakistan, aiming to strengthen technology-based economic development.

title: PM Modi Meets Qualcomm CEO Cristiano Amon to Boost India’s AI and Semiconductor Ambitions
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi Saturday held a high-level meeting with Cristiano R Amon, President and CEO of Qualcomm, where they discussed India’s rapid advancements in artificial intelligence (AI), innovation, and skill development, underscoring the country’s growing role in global technology innovation.

title: AI Revolutionizing Maharashtra's Agriculture and Society
description: Artificial Intelligence is transforming agriculture and society in Maharashtra, as stated by Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis at an event with HP and Intel. AI innovations in agriculture help predict pest infestations, reducing losses and increasing profits. The state government promotes AI adoption and emerging technologies.
content:

title: AI to make telecom network self-healing, improve customer services with shift to 6G: DoT Secretary
description: Telecom networks are set to become self-healing and customer services will improve with artificial intelligence. India is working with the ITU to harmonize AI and telecom developments. The country is also investing in AI research and startups to build a secure and inclusive AI ecosystem. AI tools are being developed to combat fraud and protect citizens from financial scams.
